DOC.criteria: BMI 3555 Kg/m2 Fasting Blood glucose > 140mg/dl Planned bariatric surgery Diabetic Medication ( Metformin , Sulfonylurea , Insuline ) Known hypersensitivity Liraglutid Pretreatment DPP4 Inhibitors GLP1 Analogue last 3 month HbA1c > 10 %
